statusHistory.description: Crew debuts and challenges Straw Hat Pirates to Davy Back Fight

keyMoments.title: Foxy Pirates Debut
keyMoments.description: The Foxy Pirates make their first appearance when Foxy, Hamburg, and Porche confront the Straw Hats on Long Ring Long Land. Foxy shoots Shelly to provoke them.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the main antagonists of the Long Ring Long Land Arc.

keyMoments.title: Foxy Pirates Challenge Davy Back Fight
keyMoments.description: Foxy reveals that his crew has won 920 Davy Back Fights and gained all 920+ crew members through these competitions. He challenges the Straw Hats to participate.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Foxy Pirates' unique recruitment method and sets up the arc's main conflict.

keyMoments.title: Foxy Pirates Capture Going Merry
keyMoments.description: The Foxy Pirates reveal they have already captured the Straw Hats' ship, forcing them to participate in the Davy Back Fight.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Foxy Pirates' cunning strategy and puts the Straw Hats at a disadvantage.

crewGoals: Win crew members through Davy Back Fight competitions
Build the largest pirate crew possible
specialAbilities: Expertise in Davy Back Fight games
reputation: Known for winning Davy Back Fights and using cunning tactics and cheating to recruit crew members

formation.circumstances: Built crew through repeated Davy Back Fight victories

trivia: The crew has won 920 Davy Back Fights, gaining all their members through these victories
The crew is known for using underhanded tactics and cheating in competitions
Porche and Hamburg were the first two members to join Foxy
